external_games.name: The Curious Study of Dr. Blackwood

name: The Curious Study of Dr. Blackwood
storyline: The Curious Study of Dr. Blackwood is a short, sweet, and simple VR tech demo that shows off our VR skills, as well as gives a sneak peek at our work on our first title, a supernatural adventure game called Project Spectral. Relax in the beautiful virtual space, mess around with weird objects and magical abilities, or dig a little deeper to uncover some insider secrets we’ve left for you to find.
summary: Explore a room full of magic and mystery in our free VR tech demo! Experiment with spectral power, reveal hidden secrets, or just chill . . . in The Curious Study of Dr. Blackwood!

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: The Curious Study of Doctor Blackwood - VR Trailer
